name: NeonTide
description:
Description

Our 2017 Global Game Jam creation, NeonTide is a fusion of bullet-hell and rhythm game mechanics. In response to the theme of waves, NeonTide requires the player to avoid floating obstacles and jump over the oncoming surf, doing so until the completion of the song will result in success.

Game Developer: Vectorsplit Interactive
